short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin that puts the focus on the active courses on brightspace pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple browser extension that aims to adjust the focus of the brightspace layout to something that's more usable. it puts the user's subjects in focus, followed by the deadlines section. the announcements are below all of that.
